privacyPolicy.title: Introduction
privacyPolicy.content:
This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how FirgoMart, operated and owned by FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited, an Indian Private Limited Company incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013 and having its principal place of business in India ("Company", "FirgoMart", "we", "us", or "our"), collects, receives, accesses, uses, processes, stores, discloses, transfers, retains, and protects information in connection with the operation of its e-commerce services.

FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited is a legally recognised e-commerce operator under applicable Indian laws. The Company operates the FirgoMart mobile application, website, seller interfaces, administrative dashboards, APIs, and allied digital infrastructure (collectively, the "Platform"). FirgoMart functions both as an e-commerce operator facilitating sales by third-party sellers and as a direct seller where the Company procures products from manufacturers, brand owners, or authorised suppliers and sells such products through the Platform within India and, where permitted, to international customers.

By accessing, browsing, registering on, or otherwise using the Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the collection, use, processing, storage, disclosure, and transfer of information as described in this Privacy Policy.

privacyPolicy.title: 1. Definitions
privacyPolicy.content: For the purposes of this Policy, FirgoMart or Company refers to FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited. User includes buyers, sellers (GST-registered and non-GST), manufacturers, vendors, service providers, logistics partners, payment partners, and visitors, whether located in India or internationally. Personal Data means any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person. Sensitive Personal Data includes financial information, government-issued identification, authentication credentials, and any data afforded enhanced protection under applicable law. Processing includes collection, recording, organisation, structuring, storage, use, disclosure, transfer, combination, restriction, erasure, or destruction of information.

privacyPolicy.title: 2. Scope and Applicability
privacyPolicy.content: This Policy applies to all Users who access or use the Platform from India or any other jurisdiction. It governs information processed when FirgoMart operates as an e-commerce operator, when FirgoMart acts as a direct seller of products, and when third-party sellers sell products domestically or internationally through the Platform. Use of the Platform constitutes free, specific, informed, and unambiguous consent to the practices described in this Policy, subject to applicable law.

privacyPolicy.title: 3. Categories of Information Collected
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart may collect information including, without limitation, seller, manufacturer, and partner details such as legal name, business name, address, contact details, GSTIN where applicable, Aadhaar and PAN where legally required, incorporation or registration documents, KYC records, bank account and settlement details, and export or regulatory documentation. Buyer information may include name, contact details, shipping and billing addresses, order history, and communication records. FirgoMart does not store card numbers, UPI credentials, or banking passwords, and all payments are processed through authorised payment service providers. Technical and usage data may include IP address, device identifiers, operating system, browser type, cookies, log files, analytics data, and usage behaviour on the Platform.

privacyPolicy.title: 4. Lawful Basis for Processing
privacyPolicy.content: Information is processed on one or more of the following lawful bases: user consent, performance of contractual obligations, compliance with applicable legal and regulatory requirements, protection of vital interests, and legitimate business interests of FirgoMart as an e-commerce operator and direct seller.

privacyPolicy.title: 5. Purpose of Collection and Use
privacyPolicy.content: Information may be used for onboarding and verification of users, account creation and management, order processing, payment settlement, logistics and delivery, customer support, dispute resolution, compliance with GST, customs, FEMA, RBI, income-tax and other applicable laws, fraud detection and prevention, audits, investigations, security monitoring, analytics, research, and improvement of Platform services.

privacyPolicy.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart uses cookies, software development kits, pixels, and similar tracking technologies to enable Platform functionality, analyse usage patterns, enhance security, prevent fraud, and improve user experience. Users may control or disable cookies through browser or device settings, subject to certain Platform features being unavailable. Where required by law, cookie consent mechanisms will be displayed before placing non-essential cookies.

privacyPolicy.title: 7. Data Sharing and Disclosure
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart may share information with government and regulatory authorities, tax departments, customs authorities, the Reserve Bank of India, law enforcement agencies, banks, payment gateways, logistics and fulfilment partners, auditors, insurers, technology vendors, and compliance service providers, strictly as required for lawful purposes and in accordance with applicable law and confidentiality obligations. Independent third-party sellers are responsible for their own handling of buyer information received for order fulfilment and act as independent data controllers under applicable law.

privacyPolicy.title: 8. Cross-Border Data Transfers
privacyPolicy.content: To facilitate global operations and international transactions, information may be transferred to, processed in, or stored in jurisdictions outside India. Such transfers shall be undertaken subject to reasonable contractual, technical, and organisational safeguards and in compliance with applicable data protection and privacy laws.

privacyPolicy.title: 9. Data Retention
privacyPolicy.content: Information is retained only for such period as is necessary to fulfil the purposes outlined in this Policy, comply with legal, regulatory, and accounting obligations, resolve disputes, enforce agreements, or meet legitimate business requirements, after which it is securely deleted, anonymised, or archived in accordance with applicable law and statutory retention requirements.

privacyPolicy.title: 10. Data Security Measures
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart implements reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards designed to protect information against unauthorised access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Notwithstanding such measures, no method of transmission or storage is completely secure, and FirgoMart does not guarantee absolute security of information.

privacyPolicy.title: 11. User Rights
privacyPolicy.content: Subject to applicable law, including the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023, Users may have the right to access their personal data, request correction or erasure, withdraw consent, restrict or object to certain processing, and nominate another person to exercise their rights in the event of death or incapacity. Requests may be made using the contact details provided below, and shall be addressed in accordance with legal timelines.

privacyPolicy.title: 12. Consent Withdrawal and Account Deletion
privacyPolicy.content: Users may withdraw consent or request deletion of their account by contacting FirgoMart at support@firgomart.com or through account settings where such functionality is available. Certain information may continue to be retained where required under applicable law, including tax, accounting, and regulatory obligations.

privacyPolicy.title: 13. Third-Party Services
privacyPolicy.content: The Platform may contain links to or integrations with third-party websites, applications, or services. FirgoMart is not responsible for the privacy practices, content, or security measures of such third parties, and Users are encouraged to review their respective privacy policies.

privacyPolicy.title: 14. Children’s Information
privacyPolicy.content: The Platform is not intended for use by individuals below the age permitted under applicable law. FirgoMart does not knowingly collect information from such individuals and will delete any such information upon becoming aware, in accordance with legal requirements.

privacyPolicy.title: 15. Amendments to the Policy
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart reserves the right to modify or update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes shall be effective upon publication on the Platform. Continued use of the Platform following such changes constitutes acceptance of the revised Policy.

privacyPolicy.title: 16. Grievance Redressal and Contact Information
privacyPolicy.content: Users may raise privacy-related queries, requests, or grievances by contacting FirgoMart at support@firgomart.com. Grievance Officer: To be notified. Designation: Grievance Officer and Data Protection Contact. Address: Registered office of FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited. Complaints shall be addressed within the timelines prescribed under applicable law.

privacyPolicy.title: 17. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
privacyPolicy.content: This Privacy Policy shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Courts having jurisdiction over FirgoMart shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

Such sellers may undertake only intra-state sales and shall not charge GST. Inter-state or international sales are strictly prohibited until GST registration is obtained and updated.

termsOfService.title: 11. User Obligations
